text: Anthony Hugh Chivers (1920-2015) was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England and won a bronze medal in the 3 miles at the 1950 British Empire Games in Auckland, New Zealand. He also competed in the 6 miles race. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:English male long-distance runners Category:Boxers at the 1950 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England
title: Anthony Chivers (athlete)
